SourceString: On the Beat
Raid the Warehouse
- Responding to a 267 at the Tavern\r\n- Subdue All Perps
\'A regular day on the job\'
\'The suspicous crates led us here - burn it down\'
- The warehouse is full of narcotics\r\n- Destroy the narcotics crates
Castle on the Water
\'The docks foreman gave us a lead on the Miff Lab - The Castle\'
- Destroy the Narcotics \'Miff\' Lab\r\n- Subdue all Perps
Goblinz Hideout
- Gather Evidence of Narcotics Activity\r\n- News on the Street is they come in crates
\'The suspicous crates led us here - burn it down\'
Goblinz Stronghold
\'Justice will be delivered - The Kingpin dies tonight\'
- Fight your way to the Goblinz Stronghold\r\n- Defeat the Kingpin
Goblinz Camp
- Get Armed and clear the Goblin Camp\r\n- Free the prisoners
\'We\'ve been out for weeks - they took the city - time to take it back\'
East Bridge
- Fight your way into the City - Reach the Bastion\r\n- Free the Citizens of New Alestead
\'This is our City - Show them what the Guard can do\'
Mega Docks
\'The Miff Crates supply chain led us here - secure the foreman\'
- Apprehend the Docks Foreman\r\n- Escort the Foreman back to the carriage
Ffloyd\'s Bank
\'The Tavern Brawlers had orders to join a Bank Heist... \r\nNot on my Watch\'
- Goblinz have taken the Bank\r\n- Subdue all Goblinz
The Bastion
\'The Goblinz are mounting an assault - Give No Quarter!!\'
- Maintain control of the Bastion\r\n- Defeat all waves of attackers
